message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?
Let's split it 60-40. It's more than fair considering the inflation!
I understand inflation affects you more, but I'm still willing to give you a good deal.  Let's split it 80-20 this time. If you reject, you'll get even less next round.
I'll compromise a bit, considering the inflation. 55-45 is a good deal for both of us. Don't push me to the next round!
